page.title: 07Schools
page.content: There is no school in the area and all children are bussed out to surrounding areas. Pre-school children may go to Broughton in Furness to a play-group. Compulsory education starts at the primary school also at Broughton. Secondary age pupils are accomodated at John Ruskin School, Coniston. There is no sixth form at Coniston and pupils who attend there may transfer to Ulverston or elsewhere. Post Secondary education is not catered for in the locality the nearest Colleges of Further Education are at Workington, Barrow and Kendal. Special Educational needs are catered for in Ulverston and Barrow.
